response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe could significantly impact and benefit your business. This product, designed with cutting-edge technology and tailored to meet your specific needs, holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. We are confident it will not only fulfill but exceed your expectations.

Given your expertise and the potential synergies between our offerings, we are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your position in the industry and the importance of fostering long-term partnerships.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this innovative solution to your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
